name: MeditationMythBuster
0:
”Alexa, open Meditation Myth Buster.”
”Give me trivia.”
”Tell me a myth.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: meditation myth buster
des: A handful of wrong ideas keep some people from trying out or sticking with a daily meditation practice. You can turn to Meditation Myth Buster whenever you feel insecure or need a gentle and mindful kick in the pants.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
